page.title: 17A Working Day of a Parent
page.content: At 7:00 in the morning Dad's alarm goes off. Then a quarter of an hour later he gets up. He has bran cereal for breakfast while reading the 'Daily Telegraph'. He leaves home at 8:00 and gets to work at 8:30 in Cardiff. The first thing he does is to check the machines. He discusses the last 24 hours progress with the Poduction Manager, Technical Manager, Chief Engineer and foreman. He has a meeting with a man from the company's Research and Development Centre, to discuss possible new materials for making paper. He then has a meeting with a Marketing Manager and analyses financial data. At approximately 5:15 he leaves work and arrives home at 5:45. After that he relaxes in the armchair and watches television. Then has supper and goes to bed at 10:30. { Stuart Ralph
